entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
